item.title: 2026 Social Security COLA: Here’s How Much Payments Will Rise Next Year
item.description: With this cost-of-living adjustment, the average retiree Social Security payment will increase by $56.

item.title: Mortgage Rates Below 6%? Don’t Hold Your Breath
item.description: MBA forecast says mortgage rates will stay above 6% despite Fed rate cuts and cooling inflation.

item.title: Current Mortgage Rates: October 24, 2025
item.description: Freddie Mac's rate for a 30-year fixed-rate mortgage reached its lowest level in over a year, averaging 6.19% for the week ending October 23.

item.description: In a season crowded with deals, price alone won’t win customers — but authenticity will.
